propel.core.utils

Class ThreadUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • propel.core.utils.ThreadUtils

  • public final class ThreadUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Common utilities around threading

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void busySpin(int value, java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit unit)
      Busy-spins the thread for the specified time interval
      static void sleep(int value, java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit unit)
      Puts the thread to the sleep state, for the specified time interval, unless an interrupt makes it runnable again
      static void yieldWait(int value, java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit unit)
      Performs a yielding wait for the specified time interval
